CalcMatrixColumnRange.name: CalcMatrixColumnRange
CalcMatrixColumnRange.description: Represents information about a value in a decision matrix column when the column is of the type number range or text range.

CalculationMatrixColumnId.description: The ID of the decision matrix column associated with the column range value.

CalculationMatrixVersionId.description: The decision matrix version ID asociated with the column range value.

Name.description: The name of the decision matrix column.

Occurrence.description: The number of times a range value is used in a decision matrix version.

RangeStartValue.description: The value that defines the start of a range.
